text:
="preserve">Vermilion is a city in Ohio in the United States.
Population.
It has a population of 10, 437, and its population is slowly falling. It fell from 10, 927 in 2000 to 10, 594 in 2010. Its peak population was 11, 127, at the 1990 census. The 1990 census was also the last census in which Vermillion gained population.
Notable Citizens.
People from Vermillion include reporter and Miss Teen USA Allie LaForce.
Location.
It is situated in North Ohio. It is just 17 miles from Sandunsky, abd a drive 35 miles east takes you to Cleveland.
Part of it is in Erie County.
